item.title: Item Playerright help plz
item.dc:creator: @Not_Pwnd Not Pwnd
item.description:
@Not_Pwnd wrote:

WAY easier way of doing it than ^ he did.

Search for

case 41:

under case 41:
add this:

if (ItemID == 773 && playerRights =< 2) 
{ // Admin only item
	sendMessage("You cannot wear this. It's for the owner only.");
        return false;
}

item.title: Item Playerright help plz
item.dc:creator: @nabster nabster
item.description:
@nabster wrote:

Wait a sec ill write good information. :|[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 06, 2008, 08:19:06 am[/size][hr]w/e i know that u need to add things like CLplayerRights under others CLs but idk which one is good one, CLplayerRights or playerRights, anyways then u need to add things like int playerRights = GetplayerRights(wearID); under CLMembers (in client.java use ctrl+f and search for CLMembers(if u have members in server) or CLranged) then under if (playerLevel[playerRanged] - CLRanged < 0) { sendMessage("You need " + CLRanged + " " + statName[playerRanged] + " to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; }add if (playerRights[playerRights] - playerRights < 3) { sendMessage("You need to be Owner to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; }
then under public int GetCLMagic(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 10718) { return 100; } if (ItemID == 10720) { return 100; } if (ItemID == 6918) { return 50; } if (ItemID == 6916) { return 50; } if (ItemID == 6924) { return 50; } if (ItemID == 6920) { return 50; } if (ItemID == 6922) { return 50; } if (ItemID == 2412) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 2414) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 2413) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 10721) { return 100; } if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Ahrim")) { return 70; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Magic Cape")) { return 100; } return 1; } or w/e u have under CLMagic(3rd time search) add this thing public int GetplayerRights(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 773) { return 3; } if it works let me know. ill make a tutorial in better quality lol

Read full topic
